issue.message: Invalid package reference in library; not included in Android: `java.awt`. Referenced from `com.sun.jna.Native.AWT`.
Invalid package reference in library; not included in Android: `javax.script`. Referenced from `org.apache.commons.text.lookup.ScriptStringLookup`.

To get local formatting use `getDateInstance()`, `getDateTimeInstance()`, or `getTimeInstance()`, or use `new SimpleDateFormat(String template, Locale locale)` with for example `Locale.US` for ASCII dates.
